name: Armstrong World Industries, Inc.
description: Armstrong World Industries, Inc. is a global leader in the design and manufacture of innovative ceiling and wall solutions. Founded in 1860, Armstrong has built a rich legacy of quality and innovation, providing advanced products for a variety of applications ranging from commercial buildings to residential spaces. The company specializes in ceiling systems, including acoustical ceiling tiles and grid systems, as well as wall panel solutions, which are designed to enhance aesthetics, acoustics, and indoor air quality. Armstrong's commitment to sustainability is evident in its focus on environmentally friendly manufacturing processes and products that contribute to LEED certifications. With a strong portfolio of brands and a customer-centric approach, Armstrong aims to create beautiful spaces that improve the quality of life for people around the globe. The company's dedication to innovation is reflected in its investment in research and development, leading to cutting-edge technologies and designs that meet the evolving needs of the architectural and design communities.
